short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add users wishlist from any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HintHint is the wishlist portal that allows you to save products from any online store onto one handy place. 

Instead of running separate wishlists with multiple retailers, taking hundreds of screenshots and struggling with open browser tabs, use the HintHint Bow button to save the items you love on our wishlist portal. 

Save your favourite finds. 

Organise your wishlists however you like.  

Share items and wishlists with friends, family and followers.
